body_html:
That's how I compile tensorflow:

cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=%CONFIGIRATION% -Dtensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS=/arch:AVX -DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=%PYTHONPATH% -Dtensorflow_BUILD_SHARED_LIB=ON -Dtensorflow_BUILD_PYTHON_BINDINGS=OFF
MSBuild /p:Configuration=%CONFIGIRATION% tensorflow_static.vcxproj
body_text:
That's how I compile tensorflow:
cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=%CONFIGIRATION% -Dtensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS=/arch:AVX -DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=%PYTHONPATH% -Dtensorflow_BUILD_SHARED_LIB=ON -Dtensorflow_BUILD_PYTHON_BINDINGS=OFF
MSBuild /p:Configuration=%CONFIGIRATION% tensorflow_static.vcxproj
body:
That's how I compile tensorflow:

```
cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=%CONFIGIRATION% -Dtensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS=/arch:AVX -DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=%PYTHONPATH% -Dtensorflow_BUILD_SHARED_LIB=ON -Dtensorflow_BUILD_PYTHON_BINDINGS=OFF
MSBuild /p:Configuration=%CONFIGIRATION% tensorflow_static.vcxproj
```
